https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hlaIVAyQc2Wo5AIpprYIkpbirAT.jpg Sergeant Tong is wracked with guilt after he unwittingly kills a young girl whilst capuring a criminal named Cheung. When the girl's sister is later kidnapped in a ploy to get Cheung released, Sergeant Tong vows to find and rescue her before she comes to harm. Beast Stalker
